titles.title: To designate the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope as the "Vera C. Rubin Observatory".
To designate the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope as the "Vera Rubin Survey Telescope".
Vera C. Rubin Observatory Designation Act
Vera C. Rubin Observatory Designation Act
Vera Rubin Survey Telescope Designation Act
Vera Rubin Survey Telescope Designation Act
Vera Rubin Survey Telescope Designation Act
Vera Rubin Survey Telescope Designation Act
Vera C. Rubin Observatory Designation Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology. H. Rept. 116-132.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 96.

action.text: Ms. Johnson (TX) moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 3196.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
The title of the measure was amended. Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary:
Vera Rubin Survey Telescope Designation Act
This bill designates the Large Synoptic Survey Telescope as the Vera Rubin Survey Telescope.
